website_summaries.verdict: A professional-looking and portable table top that can accommodate up to eight players.
pros: Three-fold design and a carrying case make it easy to store
Heavy, quality construction features cup and chip holders for eight players
cons: Some issues with the felt ripping or the table top coming apart
White decals on the felt keep cards from gliding well

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and carry.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! It folds up easily and he takes it everywhere! We have had it 3 years and the felt holds up well and it durable!
customer_reviews.author: the.efficient.mommy

customer_reviews.title: Nice look at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this table top. I removed 1 star since the bottom rips a little if you are super careful when setting up. The pieces are individually wrapped in felt making for a smooth playing surface. The silk screen raised graphics prevent smoot sliding of cards but that is fine fire the price. Looks great. This was definitely a fair deal for under $50. I do wish it was available for prime though since I had to order a different table top to make it in time for my poker night. They both ended up arriving the same day though and this was the better table top at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: buzz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Lots of good times! Heavy! Sturdy and great quality. Was a gift for my husband and he Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: derick & mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Now i just need to learn how to play it and find other people to play with me, for now it is a great dust collector.
customer_reviews.author: Book Girl

customer_reviews.title: Smooth transaction
customer_reviews.text: Huge, need to make sure you have the space for it
customer_reviews.author: DM2812

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: The table is reasonably priced and the quality is good. The wood is heavy and the felt is thick. The plastic ridges are a bit delicate but if you are careful when folding and unfolding, you should be fine. Good quality poker table.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Holding up just fine in a house with college kids living in it.
customer_reviews.text: This has been used weekly for many months now in a college dorm house - and held up just fine. I suspect more than one beer may have been spilled on it - but seems to clean up well. Folds and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: MrFixIt

customer_reviews.title: Best Friday night purchase
customer_reviews.text: $50 of yelling, screaming, smack talking , beer guzzling, personal threats, yo momma insults, $5 buy in fun. Poker night is best night
customer_reviews.author: Ian starr

customer_reviews.title: Christmas will be over the top... I love this poker mat!!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazing!! It is a perfect fit to my table and accommodates 8 players as described. The quality is fantastic and this was affordable for any budget. It is heavy duty and will be enjoyed for years. Would definitely recommend any poker player to use this mat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina A.

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son- seriously the best gift! Quality is great! Everyone that plays on it -loves it! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone complained about tape at joints coming loose very shortly after getting and using table top. Love the product. Don't like the joints falling apart very soon. I guess only way to prevent that I should to set it up and leave it alone.
customer_reviews.author: jtin42952

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS WONDERFUL.
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY, BUT THIS IS A QUALITY ITEM. IT WORKS WONDERFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He used it last week and really liked it. It will also save my kitchen table
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for Christmas. He used it last week and really liked it. It will also save my kitchen table!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Our current one was ready for the trash and this one has been great to play on
customer_reviews.text: Our weekly poker game was in need of a new table top. Our current one was ready for the trash and this one has been great to play on. The carry case makes it easy put away for the next week.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: Good for casual casino night
customer_reviews.text: It's good, it seems well made, and it's pretty heavy. I worry the straps won't hold, but so far so good. Not sure on weight, probably in the 40lb range. Only complaint and reason for 4 star instead of 5 is the printed card spaces and other printing - it's pretty cheap. It's really noticeable and hard. I would have paid another $20-25 to have a better solution, but at this price point, it's still a good buy and I would recommend it for casual casino nights. If you are playing more than once a week, you'll want to go up another price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Mock Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It great
customer_reviews.text: Its really great. I love it. But you need to have a big enough table to fit and its daily meant for an oval table. But that's ok
customer_reviews.author: Spee

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: came on time.. looks and feels good. Customer service is amazing...
customer_reviews.author: Al Niko

customer_reviews.title: Poker Table is Great, especially for many tables in the house
customer_reviews.text: I really like this poker table, it’s perfect for us. I can use this table in many areas of the house and it’s not That heavy. Matter of fact, I like it on our 7 ft Fat Cat pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I'm being told it's "perfect"
customer_reviews.text: I don't know the first thing about card playing etiquette, but my husband bought this for when he hosts poker night and he said its perfect. We have a long oval shaped table and it seemed to fit the table perfectly. It comes in a nice carrying case with a strap.
customer_reviews.author: mscheirer

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a easy way to set up for poker night
customer_reviews.text: Cup holders dont hold drinks very well .They need improvement at the drink holders
customer_reviews.author: Ruber

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and high-quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, looks even better in real life and is high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Seth R. Eisman

customer_reviews.title: This is the table top for you if you like good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and super nice! Made my lady’s poker night a big success!
customer_reviews.author: Kat T.

customer_reviews.title: Measure first
customer_reviews.text: Measure your space and table before ordering... I did and still got it wrong. Table top is a bit bigger than I anticipated but it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bassett

customer_reviews.title: good for price
customer_reviews.text: great for price a little uneven when opened, so there is a lip in the middle. felt is thin but for price and 1x month use it will do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality & horrible Customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was a real bad choice. The quality is really bad and flimsy. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! The stuff comes out really easily . I THINK THIS IS VERY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE! They never responded back to Amazon contacting them about poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Vikas Sood

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It’s heavy and great size. Beware the logo on the table is somewhat raised like a screen print on a t shirt. Cards dont glide that well.
customer_reviews.author: Grmockos

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty nice. However I am a bit worried about ...
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty nice. However I am a bit worried about the folded areas. Only time will tell but overall it is a very nice Poker table top
customer_reviews.author: Koo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece.
customer_reviews.text: A bit too big for most tables but can't beat it at that price awesome for poker night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than playing on a dining room table.
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have had tons of fun playing cards!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a birthday present and he loved it he is so glad about this one it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present and he loved it he is so glad about this one it’s durable it’s heavier than I thought it would be and it was beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected but we absolutely love it Makes the game much funnier
customer_reviews.author: LyKy4087

customer_reviews.title: Poker Table Topper, Nice Layout and More Than Decent Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice table for the money. Quite a bit nicer than I was expecting! Time will tell how well it will hold up to use/spills/cleaning, but for under $50 you can't go wrong. Bigger than I imagined, and that is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: pandah1

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well when I got it one of the corners of the felt is scuffed up a little and I'm afraid it's a little flimsy when you unfold it at the creases I don't think that's going to last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Alicia young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for the price. Early Xmas present, he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed by this as all, the bag came ripped and the one edge was cracked. Was expecting a little more quality. Won’t be a returning shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Thisgirlalm

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we were looking for it is made of real wood and does weigh around 20 plus pounds. It seems to be durable and we can't wait to use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim P.

customer_reviews.title: great quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome table topper. It fit perfectly on my table and was a hit for my recent party. I love that there are cupholders built in. It really keeps the table organized and prevents accidental spills. There is one crease down the middle that likes to grab the cards, but the material and the craftsmanship are stellar. I researched several different poker tables and this one by far was the best quality at the best price. You never know until you open it up and use it, and even though I was nervous, I was very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shelleyd73

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Just what you expect. A nice table top for the price. Good for the weekend poker game
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This table is so worth the money! Very good quality and it looks awesome on any table!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love it. More convenient than setting up full poker ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. More convenient than setting up full poker table, can use on any table.
customer_reviews.author: G STEW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best deal on Amazon. Good quality.. Very heavy. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and one of the end pieces ripped off not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father in law and he loves it!! Literally every Sunday it’s poker at his house
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Edrington

customer_reviews.title: It will do just fine
customer_reviews.text: We had poker night last night and the table was a big hit. The quility was better then expected and it came in a bag for easy transport. The only complaint was that any white you see on the table is a non slip and raised material. If your the dealer who likes to slide the cards to other players they get cought and don't go were you wanted them to.
customer_reviews.author: emily h

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality And size, arrived on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Good Table.
customer_reviews.text: Cool table. Felt is nice. Folds easily. Carrying case is great because it is heavy. Bought it for poker nights with my friends. Its not the fanciest but it definitely adds to the atmosphere. All I got were compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amirica

customer_reviews.title: Well made 8 seat table top.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and in good condition. Used it for a game and received complements for its durable construction. Can’t beat it for the price. Could use a cushion on the edge, but’s it’s not a deal breaker without. Seats 8 and the chip tray is nice and secure. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few weekends w my buddies and love it
customer_reviews.author: Jason Breakfield

product_meta.title: Giantex 8 Player Poker Mat, Portable Rubber Non-Slip Poker Table Top w/Carrying Bag for Poker Games, Blackjack, Casino
feature_bullets: ♣️ Cup Holder & Chip Tray: This poker desktop with a built-in cup holder and chip rack for each player. These 8 inlay cup holders help keep the cup in its original condition and avoid spillage. There is also a groove for the chip holder next to the cup holder to prevent the chip from rolling around. It provides players with a lot of convenience.

♣️ Convenient Foldable Design: The 80’’ x 36’’ table mat is a four-fold design, so you can fold it up and put it in our special storage bag when the game is over. Put it in a small place in your home. This portable poker table top is also suitable for taking out a trip, putting it in the car and not taking up a lot of space. Have your friends go out to play together.

♣️ High Quality Material: The poker table top is made of 1-inch flannel which moderately soft and hard and feels comfortable. The material has good elasticity that is not easy to wrinkle, even if the chips fall on the mat, there won't be a big sound. Smooth surface, less likely to be contaminated with dust and easy to clean.

♣️ High Quality Small Details: Our poker table top was carefully crafted and there was no roughness on the table, the table top at the edge is also very clean and tidy, and it won't feel uncomfortable even if it is touched. What’s more, putting the table mat on the table can also be non-slip, and the table mat will not slip and slide during the entertainment process.

♣️ Not Easy To Paint Off: The ink we use is of high quality and environmentally friendly. A certain area was painted with ink on the desktop, the bright yellow on the green fabric allows the player to see the border more clearly. If the ink on the table mat is off paint, it will affect the game experience to some extent.
